articles.description: Ross Cummings hit four 3-pointers and finished with 21 points and Jordan Strawberry had 18 points, six rebounds, seven assists and two steals to help Mercer beat Samford 74-69 on Monday night.
articles.headline: Cummings hits 4 3s, scores 21; Mercer beats Samford 74-69

articles.description: Javaris Jenkins scored 21 points, made 4 of 6 from 3-point range and blocked three shots Monday night to help Savannah State beat North Carolina A&T 108-106.
articles.headline: Savannah State beats NC A&T in MEAC showdown

articles.description: The Bison are down eight with under 30 seconds remaining, but get a couple of buckets before Kimbal Mackenzie hits a 3-pointer as time expires to beat the Raiders 65-64.
articles.headline: Bucknell uses incredible comeback, buzzer-beater to top Colgate

images.caption: The Bison are down eight with under 30 seconds remaining, but get a couple of buckets before Kimbal Mackenzie hits a 3-pointer as time expires to beat the Raiders 65-64.
images.name: Bucknell uses incredible comeback, buzzer-beater to top Colgate

articles.description: After a month and a half absence from the Associated Press Top 25, Texas A&M jumped back into the rankings this week at No. 21 on the strength of a four-game win streak.
articles.headline: Win streaks on line for Texas A&M, Missouri

articles.description: Jermaine Marrow scored 23 points, Malique Trent-Street added 20 with four 3-pointers in the second half and Hampton beat Coppin State 82-79 on Monday night.
articles.headline: Hampton grinds out 82-79 win over Coppin State

articles.description: Charles Williams scored 28 points on Monday night, RJ Cole had 18 points, nine rebounds, six assists and two steals and Howard used three big first-half runs to pull away for an 84-56 win over Maryland-Eastern Shore.
articles.headline: Howard cruises to 84-56 win over Maryland-Eastern Shore
